title: Death Domain
content: ockwave of either divine or malevolent thunder that damages nearby creatures and possibly knocks them Prone. 1 Turn On Save: Targets still take half damage 9m CON Save DOMINATE PERSON Lv 5 Enchantment Action Make a humanoid fight alongside you.Every time the creature takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination.
